about_the_game:
Orbitron is sci-fi TACTIC ARCADE combines tactical thinking with arcade skills. It offers an heroic space chess mode and RT orbi mode with upgrades and items for ships, along with experienced commanders and crews.

This game base on new type of space heroic "CHESS". Getting control of the spacefield won’t be so easy! You’ll need to win in real-time battle where, but as the attacker, you’ll have a significant advantage. When you use it.

This is a SOLO game dev project.

===========================================

  • Experience intense, turn-based battles on the space board.

  • Engage in arcade-style fights with upgradable battle ships.

  • Lead experienced crews and skilled commanders.

  • Discover and combine advanced technologies to gain an edge.

  • Built on the ELO ranking system.

===========================================

  • Quick access to the game

  • Short battle around 15-60min

  • Infinite gameplay

  • No added monetization.

  • No user data mining.

  • Playtest opening.

===========================================

Enjoy the battles. :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8/10/11
  • Processor: Laptop Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4600, Radeon HD 7600M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8/10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 / Core i5 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6770 or better, GeForce GTX 260 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: I've been experimenting with a game inspired by chess movements, but with added elements for gamers. It features unique starting formations and special movements, with experienced crews utilizing commander powers. All units are upgradable and engage in real-time arcade-style battles!
